name: Classic Burger and Fries
description: Our most famous burger with a delicious patty topped with crispy fries! Our two favorite things all in one!

name: Just-A-Burger
description: A simple, juicy, cheeseburger, without any extra frills, just the standard fare!

name: Ultimate Just-A-Burger
description: For those kids out there that just like the burger in the burger, this burger has no toppings. Not even cheese! Ask for some ketchup packets if you'd like some flavor.

name: Everything-On-It Burger
description: When the basics aren't enough, take it up a notch with this burger. Includes bacon and avocado!

name: The No-Bun Just-A-Burger
description: For our gluten free fans out there, the classic Just-A-Burger, with a lettuce wrap instead of a bun!

name: Just-Some-Fries
description: A pile of steaming hot salty fries, straight from the frier! Goes great with Just-A-Burger!

name: Cajun Fries
description: Want Just-Some-Fries but need a little spice? Experience the heat of the south with these fries!

name: Nacho Fries
description: Bring the mexican flavor into your meal with some nacho-cheese drenched fries!

name: Loaded Fries
description: Covered in cheese, ground beef and ketchup, we don't blame you if these replace a burger as your entree!

name: Cinnamon Dessert Fries
description: Covered in cinnamon sugar, these fries are a great end to a fantastic meal!

name: Powdered Sugar Dessert Fries
description: Covered in powdered sugar, these fries are a great end to a fantastic meal!

name: Variety Deal
description: Get some of our best products together for an amazing deal! The variety deal contains a Just-A-Burger, Just-Some-Fries, Classic Burger and Fries, Loaded Fries, and Cinnamon Dessert Fries!
